question:
Consider the following:
  1. Free Legal Aid
  2. Adequate means to livelihood
  3. Free & Compulsory Education to Children under Age 14
  4. Prohibition of slaughter of Cows and Calves
Which among the above were the part of the Original Constitution?
explanation:
Free Legal aid has been provided by Constitution Article 39A, which was not a part of the original constitution. This article was added by Constitution (Forty-second Amendment) Act, 1976. All other provisions were in the original constitution.
In context with option 2 its worth note that The Article 45 says *[45. The State shall endeavor to provide, within a period of ten years from the commencement of this Constitution, for free and compulsory education for all children until they complete the age of fourteen years.]. This article stands substituted by `Provision for early childhood care and education to children below the age of six years.â€”The State shall endeavor to provide early childhood care and education for all children until they complete the age of six years.` via Constitution (Eighty-sixth Amendment) Act,2002.
